response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which holds significant value to us at $12,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe we can reach an agreement that is mutually beneficial. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $11,000. This price reflects the high value of the product while allowing you to enjoy substantial savings compared to its market value. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your expectations and budget. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 11000}
